text: Return minimum X (that can contain Y items) for arbitrary number of items
I can, of course, brute-force this, but I feel like there has to be a simple function to return this number.
Concerning native functions, I'm using PHP and/or Python.

For example: there exists containers that hold X (5) breadsticks each, and 
I need to feed Y (25) people Z (3) breadsticks each.
I need to return the number of containers I have to acquire to feed these people.
(There may or may not be remainder breadsticks).
